shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users.

section.p: As of v3.3.0, after successfully calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users, including all subsequent users.

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
See recommended settings in Set the Subscribing State.

pd.p: Whether to subscribe to the audio streams of all remote users.

ul.li: : Do not subscribe to the audio streams of all remote users.
: (Default) Subscribe to the audio streams of all remote users by default.
